steps.title: Learn a Programming Language
steps.description: Start with a backend-friendly language like JavaScript (Node.js), Python, Java, or Go.

steps.title: Understand HTTP & APIs
steps.description: Learn how HTTP works, status codes, headers, and building REST APIs.

steps.title: Databases
steps.description: Learn SQL (PostgreSQL or MySQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases.

steps.title: Authentication & Authorization
steps.description: Understand user authentication, JWT, OAuth, sessions.

steps.title: Server-Side Frameworks
steps.description: Work with backend frameworks like Express.js, Django, Flask, or Spring Boot.

steps.title: Testing & Debugging
steps.description: Learn how to write tests, debug and log backend applications.

steps.title: Deploy Your App
steps.description: Deploy backend applications using services like Render, Heroku, or VPS with Docker.
